name: Roll To Infinity
description:
Roll to infinity !

Technical test project developped in 5 days.

Move left and right, avoid obstacles collision while picking up the most cubes.

You can use Arrows keys, Controller or touch the bottom left and right of the screen on Android.

You have 3HP but there are hearts to pick up some times ;)

Speed increase through each level ! 

Try to beat my 540 PB =p

Enjoy :)
